CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_info (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "ready" BOOLEAN, "structureVersion" VARCHAR, "version" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
INSERT INTO _content_info VALUES ('checksum_content', false, 'bgIYhpjRuV8zbHJE_CfelwKpJ_Td6YuGJwixiek8lmI', 'v3.5.0--tc7byJgLwfdAteYNrYPjFoM7llxjLkcoEW-cFYnP-5Q', 'ztVBeDiG3efYmk0ncIJp91w1D1vYDccDhs54qs83Y_M'); -- meta
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _content_content; -- structure
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_content (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "title" VARCHAR, "body" TEXT, "description" VARCHAR, "extension" VARCHAR, "meta" TEXT, "navigation" TEXT DEFAULT true, "path" VARCHAR, "seo" TEXT DEFAULT '{}', "stem" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
INSERT INTO _content_content VALUES ('content/projects/project1.md', 'Project 1: My Awesome Portfolio', '{"type":"minimark","value":[["h1",{"id":"project-1-my-awesome-portfolio"},"Project 1: My Awesome Portfolio"],["h2",{"id":"description"},"Description"],["p",{},"This project is a personal portfolio website showcasing my skills, projects, and experiences. It is built using Vue.js and Nuxt.js, providing a seamless and interactive user experience."],["h2",{"id":"technologies-used"},"Technologies Used"],["ul",{},["li",{},"Vue.js"],["li",{},"Nuxt.js"],["li",{},"TypeScript"],["li",{},"Axios"],["li",{},"Markdown"]],["h2",{"id":"links"},"Links"],["ul",{},["li",{},["a",{"href":"https://github.com/username/my-awesome-portfolio","rel":["nofollow"]},"GitHub Repository"]],["li",{},["a",{"href":"https://my-awesome-portfolio.com","rel":["nofollow"]},"Live Demo"]]]],"toc":{"title":"","searchDepth":2,"depth":2,"links":[{"id":"description","depth":2,"text":"Description"},{"id":"technologies-used","depth":2,"text":"Technologies Used"},{"id":"links","depth":2,"text":"Links"}]}}', '', 'md', '{}', 'true', '/projects/project1', '{"title":"Project 1: My Awesome Portfolio","description":""}', 'projects/project1', 'oubtDUcJtean4xdAD2D3JM6bXAZ_VSmcDaRCBsAZniQ'); -- oubtDUcJtean4xdAD2D3JM6bXAZ_VSmcDaRCBsAZniQ
UPDATE _content_info SET ready = true WHERE id = 'checksum_content'; -- meta
